comment: Tu Quran Sharif hadees Kala Bhoot aa Raha hai Na gardan kaatne ke liye jihad karne ke liye uthattora
amr:
# ::snt Tu Quran Sharif hadees Kala Bhoot aa Raha hai Na gardan kaatne ke liye jihad karne ke liye uthattora
(h / have-03
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Quran"
                  :op2 "Sharif"))
      :ARG1 p
      :name (n2 / name
            :op1 "Kala"
            :op2 "Bhoot")
      :mod p
      :name (n3 / name
            :op1 "Raha")
      :mod (h2 / hai-ha
            :mode expressive)
      :mod p
      :name (n4 / name
            :op1 "Na"
            :op2 "Gardan")
      :mod (j / jihad)
      :mod p
      :mode expressive
      :name (n5 / name
            :op1 "Karne")
      :mod p
      :name (n6 / name
            :op1 "Iuthattora"))
